headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: San Andreas Flight School is Now Open
content:
If you fancy yourself as a fighter pilot in the making then try honing your skills at the newly opened San Andreas Flight School.

10 brand new aeronautical challenges await you, ranging from stunt flying to tackling tricky landing scenarios. Go for the challenging Gold medals to distinguish yourself as a part of the flying elite.

Flight School can be found near the entrance to the LS International Airport (look out for the plane icon on your map).
